text: was a Japanese volleyball player. He competed in the 1964 Summer Olympics and in the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Saga Prefecture, Japan. In 1964 he was part of the Japanese team which won the bronze medal and won the silver medal in the 1968 Olympic tournament. Ikeda died on 3 January 2021 in Tokyo from lymphoma, aged 80.元男子バレー代表監督の中野尚弘さん死去 80歳 東京五輪銅、メキシコ五輪銀 ==References== ==Other websites== * profile Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Japan Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Japan Category:Japanese volleyball players Category:People from Saga Prefecture Category:Deaths from lymphoma
title: Naohiro Ikeda
